QuestData.Title: Arconiss
QuestData.Description: If I am to fight Jahesh, leader of the yaungol mist-shaman, I must have Arconiss by my side. Arconiss' ferocity is second to none.$b$bHe rests beneath the mists of the Upper Sumprushes. Find his resting place, and then use these torches to awaken him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Summon Arconiss by planting the Mist-Shaman's Torches into the Peat Mound in the Upper Sumprushes.
QuestData.CompletionText: Arconiss' size belies his prowess in battle. He will be an asset.
QuestData.RewardText: It will be difficult to lose with Arconiss by my side.
